test.instr: (:ins (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y couch))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X black) (sort Y couch))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X white) (sort Y closet))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y table)))) (:cons_not (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator)))) )
test.nl: There is a can which is black in the refrigerator. The door of the refrigerator is closed. The door of the washmachine is opened. Put a can on the couch. Go to the cupboard. Put a cup which is black on the couch. Give human the green can. Put a bottle in the microwave. Take out the white cup from the closet. There must be a yellow bottle on the table. Do not open the refrigerator.
